about.title: Who is
about.name: Noureddine MOUATAMID
about.description: I am Noureddine MOUATAMID, a twenty-four-year-old passionate about technology and professional development. Currently, I live in the beautiful city of Cannes, where I am pursuing a vocational training program at AFPA. My goal is to obtain a Bac+2 level professional diploma. Since childhood, I have developed a deep interest in technology and its impact on our way of life and work. My current training allows me to acquire advanced skills and specialized knowledge that will prepare me for future challenges and opportunities in the field I love

portfolio.descriptionCar: Homepage of a simple car sales website using JavaScript, HTML, CSS
portfolio.descriptionKit: This code creates a virtual drum kit using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (with jQuery).
